job.description: pVision Elements is looking to hire an experiencednbspFreelancenbspAlgorithm Researchernbspin the fields of computer vision  deep learningppnbspppAmerican or Canadian candidates are invited to apply and join a professional and experienced group Be part of fascinating projects and overcome exciting challengesppOur projects are diverse in many sectors combining teamwork with independent workppnbspppWe are looking for an experienced and independent freelance algorithm researcher to lead our growing activity in the US Work can take place remotely from the convenience of your homeppnbspppRequiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMSc  PhD  Postdoc in Physics Mathematics Electrical Engineering or Computer SciencesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience in computer vision  data scienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience in as many of the following pp3D reconstruction algorithm development  parameter estimation inverse problems techniques Graph Theory Optimization Deep learning GPGPU Medical ImagingppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspThorough skill in MATLAB  PythonppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspHigh proficiency in CppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGood communication skills written and verbalppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIndependent and likes challengesppnbspppEmployment TypeppFulltimeppbrppEdit job descriptionppbrp
